A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first time I saw it I hated it\, but my sister wanted to see it and made me go again with her. The first time I saw it I loved the casting and acting\, but thought the editing was really choppy. I more or less stand by that opinion\, but it's much better the second time; because when you know where things are going it's easier to follow. Overall\, a pretty good Star Wards movie\, if you're willing to sit through it twice (5 hours).
